docs.text: john carpenter directed this stylish and gory vampire flick to which has it's good side and it's bad .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's held up by some good performances and dazzling special effects leading up to an ending that's pretty satisfying .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: james woods gives an outstanding performance that almost covers up the movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the good side : some neat scenes of vampires and violence .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the bad : no scares .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: yes that's right , even though being directed by one of horror's most cherished directors , 'vampires' is the least bit scary , if not at all .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: james woods stars as jack a vampire hunter out to stop the plans of the 'master' vampire valek played by thomas ian griffith whom wants vampires to walk in the daylight .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: daniel baldwin plays his sidekick montoya , a wise-cracking guy who really isn't that funny .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in the opening scene jack along with montoya and the team of vampire hunters , find an abandoned house to which vampire occupy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: of course we all know sunshine kills vampires , and that is just how they kill these vampires : hooking them to ropes and dragging them outside letting them burn to death .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: after throwing a party for what happened , the vampires that did not die come back to trash it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they kill almost all of jack's team , leaving only a few alive .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: sheryl lee plays a prostitute katrina who was bitten by valek , but not yet turned into a vampire .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she is rescued by jack and ? flees with them on their search for valek .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they have to fight they're way against vampires , leading up to a finale that is well-done with great special effects .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: 'vampires' definately could have been done better .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the make-up , special effects and story are first rate , but there is no scares or terror that the film could have had .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it to me had more humor than horror , almost being compared to 'fright night' with the mix of violence and comedy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: john carpenter does a great job of directing this film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he eases through some tough times and saves the flaws , which are noticeable but forgettable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the script is clever and funny , with many lines that make us laugh out loud .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i much enjoyed 'vampires' with a few exceptions .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's one of those films you see but don't take to heart .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: you enjoy the time you spent and go on .

docs.text: the recently released 'psycho' is the same way , it's not as good as you'd hope but it is fun and entertaining .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: 'vampires' is a good horror flick with no scares but plenty of other content to please the viewer .
